meta.name: Dark Fantasy / Gaming Design System
meta.description: High-level design guidelines for a dark-mode-first, modern UI with vibrant accents. Use this file to instruct AI or developers to replicate the look across the app.
meta.references: GameScribe (AI storytelling), crypto/finance dashboards, Wizard Casino (gaming).

designPrinciples.darkModeFirst: The entire interface is built on deep dark backgrounds. Default to dark; light mode is optional. Prioritize readability and visual impact in low-light.
designPrinciples.vibrantAccentsOnDark: Use bright, saturated accent colors sparingly against the dark canvas. Accents draw attention to CTAs, active states, and key data.
designPrinciples.depthAndLayering: Create hierarchy with subtle gradients, soft glows, and card elevation. Cards/panels sit slightly above the background; use borders or inner glow, not flat fills.
designPrinciples.modernAndSleek: Clean lines, ample negative space, contemporary typography. Avoid clutter; let elements breathe.
designPrinciples.visualHierarchy: Establish hierarchy through size, weight, and color: headings command attention (white, bold); body is readable (light gray); secondary content is muted.
designPrinciples.consistency: Apply the same radius, spacing scale, and component patterns everywhere. Rounded corners throughout.
designPrinciples.engagement: Use color and subtle motion (glows, gradients) to make the UI feel alive and premium without being noisy.

color.philosophy: Deep charcoal/blue-black canvas with a few high-saturation accent colors. Text is high-contrast for accessibility.

backgrounds.primary: Deep charcoal or blue-black. HSL approx: 224 40% 6% or 220 20% 8%. Near #0A0815 to #1A1E2C.
backgrounds.secondary: Slightly lighter for cards/panels. HSL approx: 224 30% 10% or 222 25% 12%. #1A1E2C, #272B3A.
backgrounds.elevated: For modals, dropdowns. One step lighter than secondary, optional subtle inner glow.

accents.primary: Vibrant purple/magenta for main CTAs and key highlights. HSL 270 80% 55% to 280 90% 60%. #8A2BE2, #A020F0.
accents.secondary: Electric blue for links, selected states. HSL 210 100% 56%. #00C8FF, #3A82F6.
accents.success: Bright green for positive values, success. #00FF00 range or #2ECC71.
accents.destructive: Red for errors, destructive actions. Softer in dark: HSL 0 70% 45%.

text.primary: Off-white or pure white for headings and important content. #FFFFFF, #F0F0F0.
text.muted: Medium gray for labels, placeholders. #808080, HSL 213 10% 55%.

borders.default: Subtle, dark. HSL 220 15% 22% or similar. Avoid bright borders except on focus (use ring/glow).

typography.philosophy: Modern, geometric sans-serif. Clean and legible; headings have presence; body is comfortable to read.

fontFamily.sans: Inter, Poppins, Montserrat, or similar. System fallback: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, sans-serif.
fontFamily.heading: Same as sans or a slightly more distinctive sans (e.g. Plus Jakarta Sans). Bold for H1/H2.

typography.letterSpacing: Slight negative on large headings (-0.025em to -0.03em). Normal for body.
typography.lineHeight: Generous for body (1.5–1.65). Tighter for display headings if desired.

spacing.philosophy: Generous and consistent. Use a scale (e.g. 4, 8, 12, 16, 24, 32, 48, 64).
spacing.cardPadding: Comfortable internal padding: 1.25rem–1.5rem minimum for cards/panels.
spacing.componentGap: Consistent gap between form elements, list items (0.75rem–1rem).

layout.structure: Card-based and modular. Content lives in rounded panels; sidebar (if any) is fixed, dark.
layout.grid: Flexible grid; two-column layouts for hero/content split. Collapse to single column on small screens.
layout.maxWidth: Constrain main content width for readability (e.g. 1280px); allow full-bleed for hero or banners.
layout.borderRadius: Rounded everywhere: 0.5rem–1rem for cards, 0.375rem–0.5rem for buttons and inputs. Softer than sharp.

buttons.primary: Rounded (0.5rem–0.75rem). Background: vibrant purple/magenta or gradient (purple–blue). White bold text. Optional subtle outer glow or shadow.
buttons.secondary: Dark background, light border, white or light gray text. Same radius.
buttons.ghost: Transparent, light text; hover: subtle background.

inputs.base: Dark background (elevated), rounded corners, subtle border. Placeholder: muted gray; text: light.
inputs.focus: Accent ring or glow (purple/blue), not heavy border.

cards.base: Dark, slightly lighter than page background. Rounded (0.75rem–1rem). Optional subtle border or inner gradient for depth.
cards.elevated: Slightly more padding; optional soft shadow or glow for modals/popovers.

navigation.bar: Dark, full-width. Logo left; primary CTA right. Optional thin top banner (accent color) for announcements.
navigation.sidebar: Fixed, dark. Icons + labels; active item: accent background or left border.

tabs.active: Accent background or strong accent underline. Inactive: muted text.
tabs.pill: Pill-shaped container; active tab has solid or gradient fill.

components.badgesAndPills: Small radius; accent or muted background; high-contrast text.

effects.glow: Use sparingly on primary CTAs or key metrics. Box-shadow with accent color, blurred.
effects.gradients: Purple-to-blue or purple-to-magenta for hero areas, buttons, or decorative backgrounds. Keep subtle on dark.
effects.shadows: Soft, dark shadows for elevation (e.g. 0 4px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.4)). Avoid harsh black.

motion.philosophy: Subtle and purposeful. Prefer short transitions (150–300ms) for hover/focus.
motion.hover: Slight brightness or scale; optional glow increase on buttons.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on dark meets WCAG AA. White/light gray on dark blue-black typically passes.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus ring (accent color) for keyboard users.

implementation.cssVariables: Define --background, --foreground, --primary, --secondary, --muted, --accent, --border, --radius in globals.css. Prefer HSL for theme switching.
implementation.darkDefault: Default theme is dark. Use class 'light' on html for light mode if needed.
implementation.tailwind: Map design tokens to Tailwind theme (colors, borderRadius, spacing). Include packages/ui-components in content for shared components.
